events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund. The product delivered is not what I ordered and I am quite disappointed.
The system has categorized the customer's issue as Refund based on keywords detected in the message.
Customer support agent JohnSmith has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello, I’m John from support. I’m sorry for the inconvenience caused by receiving the wrong item. Let me help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund more efficiently?
Thanks for your quick reply. My order number is 987654321 and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect item I received.
We have reviewed the photo and your order details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thank you for your prompt resolution. I’m happy to accept the full refund and appreciate that I don’t have to send the wrong item back.
The refund has been processed successfully to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the credit to appear.
We are following up to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since there has been no further communication, we have closed this case. Thank you for contacting support and we hope to serve you better in the future.
